column2: Removal of Immigration Railroading
All nations in the New World, Oceania, or South Africa will no longer recieve their immigration buff for simply existing after 1900.
A shame.
Civilized Asian Nerf
Civilized player nations in India & China will be getting nerfs to mobilization & pop-growth as the game goes on to compensate for their ludicrious accepted-pop & brigade count.
Damn the acts of attempting to balance Asia.
Early-game Asian Nerf
Civilized player nations in India & China will be getting nerfs to mobilization & pop-growth as the game goes on to compensate for their ludicrious accepted-pop & brigade count.
Damn the acts of attempting to balance Asia.
Mid-game Asian Nerf
Civilized player nations in India & China will be getting nerfs to mobilization & pop-growth as the game goes on to compensate for their ludicrious accepted-pop & brigade count.
Damn the acts of attempting to balance Asia.
Late-game Asian Nerf
Civilized player nations in India & China will be getting nerfs to mobilization & pop-growth as the game goes on to compensate for their ludicrious accepted-pop & brigade count.
Damn the acts of attempting to balance Asia.
Zhourao Liferating Increase
With all of Australia now controlled, low liferating provinces will have their liferating increased.
Excellent.
Midwest Liferating Increase
With Midwest & Central North America colonized, provinces in the region will have their liferating increased
Excellent.
Americas, South Africa, Oceania Liferating Increase
To compensate for immigration railroading being turned off in 1900 & some lopsided liferating in some areas, liferating is increased across the board.
Let the Buffing Commence.
Scandinavian Cores Liferating Increase
To compensate for low liferating in some provinces, and due to it's multi-front nature liferating has been increased for Scandinavia.
Let the Buffing Commence.
